thread.title: Ground News - A major theme park reopens as the coast is set to sizzle
thread.title_full: Ground News - A major theme park reopens as the coast is set to sizzle

author: Gold Coast Bulletin
title: Ground News - A major theme park reopens as the coast is set to sizzle
text:
Summary by Gold Coast Bulletin A popular Gold Coast water thrills theme park has reopened just in time for the heatwave which ramped up on Thursday after closing to “assess damage” from the Christmas storm. Share menu More
Filters 2 Articles 2 Articles All Left Center Right
Gold Coast Bulletin Media Conglomerate: Murdoch Family A major theme park reopens as the coast is set to sizzle A popular Gold Coast water thrills theme park has reopened just in time for the heatwave which ramped up on Thursday after closing to “assess damage” from the Christmas storm.
47 minutes ago · Southport, Australia Read Full Article
